title: Filesystem
body: This plugin presents a simple and intuitive interface for common filesytem operations such as reading/writing and listing the contents of directories.
The Filesystem plugin ship with a native Angular & es2015+/Typescript wrappers as well as being available on window.
You can find the API and interface documentation for everything below. The main classes to pay attention to are:
- This is the main API for interacting with the filesystem.
- The available directory locations for the application.
- The available encodings when reading/writing a file.
The avaiable directories on the system
